Lack of Harmonious Action Brings Disease.--It is the lack of harmonious action in the human organism that brings disease. The imagination may control the other parts of the body to their injury. All parts of the system must work harmoniously. The different parts of the body, especially those remote from the heart, should receive a free circulation of blood. The limbs act an important part and should receive proper attention.--SpT Series B, No. 15, p 18, Apr 3, 1900. (CH 587.)
